info.title: Global Change Information System API
info.description: Who we are, what the GCIS is, and how we use identifiers and semantic information to provide points of reference and traceability. Examples and tutorials for using this system as a researcher, citizen scientist, application developer or information theorist. A description of how the information is structured, including the overlaps between relational and semantic representations of the information. Complete documentation for the API, including methods for browsing and finding resources.
